Monster ID7405

The King Kurask is a superior variant of the kurask. It has a chance of spawning after purchasing the unlock Bigger and Badder for 150 Slayer reward points from any Slayer master.

Contents

  • 1 Drops
    • 1.1 100%
    • 1.2 Weapons and armour
    • 1.3 Runes
    • 1.4 Herbs
    • 1.5 Seeds
    • 1.6 Other

    • 1.8 Tertiary
    • 1.9 Superior Slayer tertiary
  • 2 Changes
  • 3 References

Drops[edit | edit source]

In addition to 100% drops and tertiary drops, superior slayer monsters will always roll 3 additional items, of which only 1 roll may be from the superior unique table. The other rolls are performed on the regular counterpart's table; their displayed drop chances represent a single roll.

Drop rates estimated based on 480,493 kills from the Drop Rate Project, unless otherwise cited.

The average King kurask kill is worth 89,139.06.

The average King kurask kill while on a Konar task is worth 91,541.31.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
23 February 2017
(update | poll)

The king kurask was given a graphical update to be more distinguishable from their regular variant.
